projectName: Multi-Tenant SaaS Platform with Project & Task Management
description: A fully dockerized multi-tenant SaaS application with authentication, role-based access control, project and task management, and strict tenant-level data isolation.

projects.name: Multi-Tenant SaaS Platform
projects.description: Core SaaS platform with tenant isolation, authentication, and role-based access control.

projects.name: Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time analytics dashboard for monitoring user activity, system performance, and tenant-level metrics.

notes: This platform does not implement a global super admin. Tenant admins manage all tenant-level operations. All credentials are created automatically through seed scripts during docker-compose startup.
